titleStmt.title: A letter from Sir Hardress Waller and several other gentlemen at Dublin, to Lieutenant General Ludlowe: with his answer to the same.
titleStmt.author: Waller, Hardress, Sir, 1604?-1666?
Ludlow, Edmund, fl. 1691-1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Allen at the Rising Sun in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
